name: CMSyncProtocol
desc: A type that provides behavior for syncing time.

items.name: func convertTime<T>(CMTime, to: T) -> CMTime
items.desc: Converts a time from one timebase or clock to another timebase or clock.

items.name: func rate<T>(relativeTo: T) -> Double
items.desc: Queries the relative rate of one timebase or clock relative to another timebase or clock.

items.name: func rateAndAnchorTime<T>(relativeTo: T) -> (rate: Double, anchorTime: CMTime, referenceTime: CMTime)
items.desc: Queries the relative rate of one timebase or clock relative to another timebase or clock, and the times of each timebase or clock at which the relative rate went into effect.

items.name: func mightDrift<T>(relativeTo: T) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether itâ€™s possible for the clock to drift relative to the input.
